TEXT: kathayasva mamādya tvaṃ chidyate yena saṃśayaḥ||
NOTE:
This chapter echoes and is partly based on MBh 12.247.1-10 (Mokṣadharma, see parallel passages in the apparatus):
Łbhīṣma uvāca |
bhūtānāṃ guṇasaṃkhyānaṃ bhūyaḥ putra niśāmaya |
dvaipāyanamukhād bhraṣṭaṃ ślāghayā parayānagha ||$1
Łdīptānalanibhaḥ prāha bhagavān dhūmravarcase |
tato 'ham api vakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ putra nidarśanam ||$2
Łbhūmeḥ sthairyaṃ pṛthutvaṃ ca kāṭhinyaṃ prasavātmatā |
gandho gurutvaṃ śaktiś ca saṃghātaḥ sthāpanā dhṛtiḥ ||$3
Łapāṃ śaityaṃ rasaḥ kledo dravatvaṃ snehasaumyatā |
jihvā viṣyandinī caiva bhaumāpyāsravaṇaṃ tathā ||$4
Łagner durdharṣatā tejas tāpaḥ pākaḥ prakāśanam |
śaucaṃ rāgo laghus taikṣṇyaṃ daśamaṃ cordhvabhāgitā ||$5
Łvāyor aniyamaḥ sparśo vādasthānaṃ svatantratā |
balaṃ śaighryaṃ ca mohaś ca ceṣṭā karmakṛtā bhavaḥ ||$6
Łākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdo vyāpitvaṃ chidratāpi ca |
anāśrayam anālambam avyaktam avikāritā ||$7
Łapratīghātatā caiva bhūtatvaṃ vikṛtāni ca |
guṇāḥ pañcāśataṃ proktāḥ pañcabhūtātmabhāvitāḥ ||$8
Łcalopapattir vyaktiś ca visargaḥ kalpanā kṣamā |
sad asac cāśutā caiva manaso nava vai guṇāḥ ||$9
Łiṣṭāniṣṭavikalpaś ca vyavasāyaḥ samādhitā |
saṃśayaḥ pratipattiś ca buddhau pañceha ye guṇāḥ ||$10
